mapper.select: select uf.id, uf.uid, uf.fid, uf.remark, u.nickname, a.url avatar, uf.created_at, uf.updated_at from user_friend `uf` LEFT JOIN user u on uf.fid = u.id left join avatar a on a.uid = u.id where uf.uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into user_friend (uid, fid, remark) VALUE (#{uid}, #{fid}, #{remark})
